Package bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.util

UI library generic components.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CheckBoxListSelectionListener
    Define a listener to be used with CheckBoxList.
    ColumnManagableTable
    Define a way to handle column selection in a JTable.
    ExportMonitor  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicSelectTableAction
    This class handles selection behaviors of entries in an Table.
    CheckBoxList
    Implement a JList where cells are check boxes.
    CheckBoxListItem
    Element data to be used with CheckBoxList.
    CheckboxListItemRenderer
    Renderer of data to be used with CheckBoxList.
    CSVExport
    This class is responsible for saving Table data in an OutputStream using the standard CSV format.
    JHeadPanel
    This class defines a foldable JPanel.
    JKTable
    Define a JTable with a Column Selection Manager.
    JKTableModel
    Define the data model flavor to use with JKTable.
    JPercentLabel
    This is a component capable of displaying a percentage value as a colored bar.
    ProgressTinyDialog
    This is simple Dialog displaying up to two progress bars.
    RaisedHeaderBorder
    This is a custom border for the raised header pseudo 3D effect.
    ResultTableHeaderPanel
    This panel is used to add a header on top of JTableHeader.
    RetractPanel
    This class defines a simple retractable panel.
    SaveTableToCSVFileAction
    This class handles the action allowing a user to save to a CSV file the content of a JTable.
    SearchField
    This class provides a compact search field.
    TableColumnManager
    Define a way to handle column selection in a JTable.
    TableHeaderColumnItem
    Define a way to handle column selection in a JTable.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BasicSelectTableAction.SelectType
